comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: I am assuming you are from the management. It looks like a mini casino to me. I hope the games are probable fair, otherwise there are always this chance of manipulating the results and people will be less interested to play in your casino. Anyway, that's should be the concern for the casino side. It's obvious that you are new to the forum and still learning the environment. But the decision to expose your product to the community is a right choice. There are many projects who made their business successful starting from this community. However, to make things to work properly for you, you need a proper marketing strategy.1. This is an announcement topic for you. It's the hub for you to introduce and build a community for your product. As you are already suggested a copper membership will allow you to present the business properly to attract more attention. You will be able to post graphics and using the graphics you can create a nice ANN thread. 2. You need exposure for the product all over the forum (possibly in all topics that are discussed by the members). For that a signature campaign is the best start. There are other methods of advertising. Some of them are: Review campaign, launching special promo, sponsoring events etc. With a good strategy you can combined all of these to get the best ROI.Feel free to contact me anytime if you need such co-operation. Welcome to the forum.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: ajiz138 on June 21, 2023, 02:40:59 PMQuote from: Fivestar4everMVP on June 21, 2023, 02:20:29 PMAnd by the way, I signed up on the casino, only got a $1 sign up bonus, the op said I will get $5, why the lie? What? only one $1 credited? when registering using a cellphone number, is that required or can it be optional?Looks like I'll have to wait for more explanation from the OP.Well, sincerely, I don't trust this casino, yeah,  just $1 was given and it looks like minimum bet on the site is also $1, how's that,?  And yeah, phone number is required, not optional, and after the first stage of the registration which requires your email, phone number, username and password, the next page will ask you to enter your name, which includes your first and last name, this is required, not optional, and without filling it in, you won't be able to access any other part of the casino..Address, postal code and others are all optional though.Like I said, I don't trust the casino, giving a $1 bonus instead of the said $5, and minimum bet on the site being $1, is suspicious for me.NOTE that I was trying to play dice, and this page is where I was asked to enter the amount i want to bet.
